doc.after: A derived reworked or remani fossil is a fossil found in rock that accumulated significantly later than when the fossilized animal or plant died 43 Reworked fossils are created by erosion exhuming freeing fossils from the rock formation in which they were originally deposited and their redeposition in an younger sedimentary deposit
